CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01B02

TITLE.P: Contract for the the supply of vehicles, plant and tools for a construction plant fitting workshop at Thurles FET Centre in eleven (11) Lots

SHORT_DESCR.P: Tenders are invited under the open procedure from suitably competent firms for the supply of equipment and materials required for training of apprentices for Phase 2 Construction Plant Fitting at Tipperary ETB Further Education and Training Centre, Archerstown, Thurles, Co Tipperary. The requirements are split into eleven (11) Lots as set out below.
Tenderers may apply for one or more lot(s).
Heavy plant machinery used for demonstration.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The Contracting Authority reserves the right to utilise this contract for the replacement of any of the vehicles, plant and tools originally supplied for the construction plant fitting workshop. The Contracting Authority will go to the successful tenderer under the relevant Lot for any such replacement items. This option will apply for the duration of the contract i.e. four (4) years.

The Contracting Authority also reserves the right to utilise this contract for the procurement of any additional items of equipment that may be required to meet revised syllabus requirements in the delivery of Construction Plant Fitting training courses for apprentices at the Archerstown Training Centre.

INFO_ADD.P: All information relating to this tender is published on www.etenders.gov.ie Ref ID: 130092.

Etenders ID: 130092.
1. The estimated total value of the any purchases pursuant to contract will not exceed 750 000 EUR (ex VAT) over its lifetime, split between the eleven (11) Lots.
2. It is emphasised, however, that this figure is provided strictly for indicative purposes only as there is no guaranteed expenditure under the contract.

3. Interested parties must register their interest on the eTenders web site (www.etenders.gov.ie) in order to be included on the mailing list for clarifications. All information relating to attachments, including clarifications and changes, will be published on the Irish Government Procurement Opportunities Portal (www.etenders.gov.ie) only. Registration is free of charge. The Contracting Authority will not accept responsibility for information relayed (or not relayed) via third parties.
4. This is the sole call for competition for this service.
5. The Contracting Authority will not be responsible for any costs, charges or expenses incurred by tenderers.
6. Contract award will be subject to the approval of the competent authorities.
7. It will be a condition of award that tenderers are tax compliant.

8. If for any reason, it is not possible to award contract to the a designated successful tenderer(s) emerging from this competitive process under a Lot(s); the Contracting Authority reserves the right to award the contract to the next highest scoring tenderer under the relevant Lot on the terms advertised at any time during the tender validity period. This shall be without prejudice to the right of the Contracting Authority to cancel this competitive process and/or initiate a new contract award procedure at its sole discretion.
9. At its absolute discretion, the Contracting Authority may elect to terminate this procurement process or any contract awarded under any of the Lots at any time.

10. Please note in relation to all documents, that where reference is made to a particular standard, make, source, process, trademark, type or patent, that this is not to be regarded as a de facto requirement. In all such cases it should be understood that such indications are to be treated strictly and solely for reference purposes only, to which the words "or equivalent" will always be appended.

11. Without prejudice to the principle of equal treatment, the Contracting Authority is not obliged to engage in a clarification process in respect of tenders with missing or incomplete information. Therefore, tenderers are advised to ensure that they return fully completed tenders in order to avoid the risk of elimination from the competition.
